Title: Lupin III: Pilot Film (1978)
Description: ["A remastered version of the Pilot film, realised in 1978, re-photographed in cinemascope and re-dubbed for being screened in cinema before of 1st movie [Mamoo's 1st copy]. In 1989, it was included on the ", Lupin III - Secret File OVA, '.', '\n', '\n']
Characters: ['Lupin III, Arsene', 'Jigen, Daisuke', 'Mine, Fujiko', 'Ishikawa XIII, Goemon', 'Zenigata, Kouichi', 'Akechi, Kogoro', 'Narrator']
Voices: ['Hirokawa, Taichirou', 'Kobayashi, Kiyoshi', 'Masuyama, Eiko', 'Naya, Gorou', 'Chikaishi, Shinsuke', 'Tanaka, Nobuo']
